participant_2.background:
I'm going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams.
I want to be reincarnated as a cat so I can spend my days lazing around in the sun and chasing mice.
I do not have kids, but I love taking my friends to local coffee shops and bookstores.

i have a ten year old son.

content.text: What's up?
Not much. Just watching some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and studying for my upcoming exams.
Cool! I love his music. What exam are you studying for?
I have an exam in math next week. I'm not really good at math, so I'm trying to study as much as I can.
I'm not good at math either. I always have to study hard for my math exams.
Yeah, it's definitely not my favorite subject.
What are you going to do after you're done studying?
I'm not sure. Maybe I'll go to the bookstore or the coffee shop.
I love going to the bookstore. I could spend hours there browsing the shelves.
Me too! I love finding new books to read.
What's your favorite book?
I have a lot of favorite books, but one of my favorites is "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
That's a great book! I've read it a few times.
It's so good! I love the characters and the story.
Me too! It's one of the best books I've ever read.
Have you read any of Fitzgerald's other books?
I've read "The Beautiful and Damned" and "Tender is the Night." I like them both, but "The Great Gatsby" is my favorite.
I've heard good things about "The Beautiful and Damned." I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a good book.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem
